question: Hey girls, I havent heard from you in a while (Bevin/Geneva) How have you all been? I hope everything is going ok. Capermom things going good with you? I have another appt. on the 24th. I will get another u/s and tested for gestational diabetes. Im hoping to avoid it this time. Had it with last pregnancy. Well let me know what is going on. I think we start to worry when we dont hear from you for a while.
title: Bevin/Capermom/Geneva
